• Influencer: Andrew Clark
            • Brand: Red Rooster
            • Fee: ~$9,247
            • Deliverables: 1 x LinkedIn post, 2 x Twitter post, 3 x 3-minute vlog, 3 x Media interview, 2 x Pinterest pin
            • Exclusivity: 10 weeks
            • Engagement: 3 months
            • Usage: 6 months
            • Start: November 2025
